Posts.EditableText: I recently tried to download a short quest I created for kicks to see if I could. It worked in the sense that something downloaded, it just wasn’t the game. Instead the zip file contained a seemingly random array of sound files and memes as well as photos and word art in the shape of the Anonymous mask. If anybody has had this happen before, is there any reason for this? I tried downloading it again and the game downloaded.
Posts.HTML: I recently tried to download a short quest I created for kicks to see if I could. It worked in the sense that something downloaded, it just wasn’t the game. Instead the zip file contained a seemingly random array of sound files and memes as well as photos and word art in the shape of the Anonymous mask. If anybody has had this happen before, is there any reason for this? I tried downloading it again and the game downloaded.
